description:
Hi! Come stay at an amazing artist luxury loft right in the middle of Brooklyns best neighborhood, Williamsburg! The space has amazing light and is filled with plants and beautiful high end furniture.  My place is close to Fette Sau, Williamsburg Cinemas, Maison Premiere, St. Anselm, and Samurai Mama. You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space, the neighborhood, the kitchen, the comfy bed, and the light. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The apt is about 650sf and has a great outdoor terrace. The apt has a washer and dryer as well as dishwasher.

You will be 5 min walk to the Marcy JMZ train and about 7 min walk to the Bedford L train. There are tons of bars and restaurants in the area.
name: Luxury Loft in Williamsburg
